tika-s0305t11:3_2: Yathābhūtaṁ nāma imasmiṁ sutte “samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t11:3_4: Tathā hi yathābhūtavasena kāraṇacchedo kato “tathā yasmā”tiādivacanehi.
tika-s0305t11:5_2: Yadi evaṁ kasmā visuṁ visuṁ desanāti āha “tena tena abhilāpenā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t11:7_1: Duggatito saṁsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṁ, saggamaggo mokkhamaggo ca.
tika-s0305t11:7_2: Tasmiṁ niyyāne niyuttā, taṁ ettha atthīti niyyānikā.
tika-s0305t11:7_3: Vacīduccaritasaṁkilesato vā niyyātīti ī-kārassa rassattaṁ ya-kārassa ka-kāraṁ katvā niyyānikā.
tika-s0305t11:8_1: Visikhāgahaṇena ca gāmādigahaṇe viya tannivāsino visesato gahitā “āgato gāmo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0305t11:8_5: Ayāthāvato uppattiṭṭhitisaṁhārādivasena loko akkhāyati etenāti lokakkhāyikā.
tika-s0305t11:8_6: Iti iminā pakārena bhavo, iminā abhavoti evaṁ pavattāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṁ.
tika-s0305t11:12_0: 1081.“Isīnaṁ patanuppatanavasena osīdanauppatanaṭṭhānavasena evaṁ ‘isipatana’nti ‘laddhanāme’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vivarituṁ ‘ettha hī”’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:13_0: Āmantesīti ettha yasmā dhammacakkappavattanatthaṁ ayaṁ āmantanā, tasmā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya satthu pubbacaritaṁ saṅkhepeneva pakāsetuṁ vaṭṭatīti “dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:13_1: Tattha mārabalaṁ bhinditvāti mārañca mārabalañca bhañjitvā.
tika-s0305t11:13_2: Atha vā mārassa abbhantaraṁ bāhirañcāti duvidhaṁ balaṁ bhañjitvā.
tika-s0305t11:13_3: “Dveme, bhikkhave, antā”ti ettha anta-saddo “pubbante ñāṇaṁ aparante ñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya bhāgapariyāyoti āha “dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:15_0: Saccañāṇādivasena tayo parivaṭṭā etassāti tiparivaṭṭaṁ, ñāṇadassanaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:15_4: Ñāṇena kattabbassa ca pariññāpaṭivedhādikiccassa ca jānanañāṇaṁ, “tañca kho paṭivedhato pagevā”ti keci.
tika-s0305t11:16_0: Paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkanti idaṁ tattha ñāṇakiccaṁ padhānanti katvā vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:16_2: Atha vā cakkanti āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṁ cakkañca, dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi dhammacakkaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:16_3: Yathāha “dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṁ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṁ, dhammena pavattatīti dhammacakkaṁ, dhammacariyāya pavattatīti dhammacakka”ntiādi.
tika-s0305t11:16_6: Imāya desanāyāti iminā suttena pakāsentena bhagavatā yathāvuttañāṇadvayasaṅkhātaṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ nāma pavattanakiccassa aniṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0305t11:16_8: Pavattitaṁ nāma kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya yāva buddhuppādo, ettakaṁ kālaṁ appavattapubbassa pavattitattā, uparimaggādhigamo panassa atthaṅgato evāti.
tika-s0305t11:17_1: Divasassa hi tatiyo bhāgo pahāro nāma.
tika-s0305t11:17_2: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttenā”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:17_4: Sabbaññutaññāṇobhāsoti sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvena pavatto obhāso cittaṁ paṭicca utusamuṭṭhāno veditabbo.
tika-s0305t11:17_5: Yasmā bhagavato dhammacakkappavattanassa ārambhe viya parisamāpane ativiya uḷāratamaṁ pītisomanassaṁ udapādi, tasmā “imassapi udānassā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:19_4: Yasmā pana akārādike sarasamaññā, kakārādike byañjanasamaññā, ubhayattha vaṇṇasamaññā, tasmā vuttaṁ “vaṇṇānaṁ vā ekadesā yadidaṁ byañjanā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:19_6: Byañjanaggahaṇeneva cettha ākāraniruttiniddesā gahitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:19_10: Vibhattiyo hi atthavacaneneva vivaranti, tāhi kāraṇapaññattiyo vuttāyevāti, tāhipi atthapadāni gahitāneva honti.
tika-s0305t11:19_11: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṁ nettiaṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0305t11:21_5: Tenāha “na hi dukkhaṁ adukkhaṁ nāma hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t11:21_6: Aññabhāvānupagamenāti samudayādisabhāvānupagamanena musā na hotīti añño aññathā na hotīti anaññathaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:25_0: 1091.Ananubodhāti paṭivedhassa anurūpabodhābhāvena. Appaṭivedhāti saccānaṁ paṭimukhaṁ vedhābhāvena.
tika-s0305t11:31_0: 1098.Paṭividdhattā desitattā cāti iminā paṭivedhañāṇena desanāñāṇena ca pariggahitattā ariyasantakāni honti ariyassa bhagavato santakabhāvato.
tika-s0305t11:33_0: 1100.Ekappaṭivedhoti ekeneva ñāṇena catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ ekajjhaṁ paṭivedho.
tika-s0305t11:39_0: 1105.Bhaveyyaceti dukkhadomanassāni ajjhupekkhitvā sahitehi tehi saccābhisamayo bhaveyyāti evaṁ parikappanā na kātabbāti.
tika-s0305t11:41_1: So hi “idameva saccaṁ moghamañña”nti gāhassa mukhabhūtattā mukhanti adhippeto.
tika-s0305t11:41_2: Tañca apare adiṭṭhasaccā olokenti, diṭṭhasaccā pana neva olokenti.
tika-s0305t11:43_0: 1110.Kukkuko pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa hatthoti attho. Kukkūti tasseva nāmaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:48_0: Vigatacittoti attatthaparatthato apagatavitakko addasa evaṁ adhiṭṭhahiṁsūti sambandho.
tika-s0305t11:48_1: Sambarimāyanti sambarena asurindena uppāditaṁ asuramāyaṁ, yaṁ “indajāla”ntipi vuccati indassa mohanatthaṁ uppāditattā.
tika-s0305t11:48_3: Yathā neti ne asure yathā so puriso passati, evaṁ adhiṭṭhahiṁsu.
tika-s0305t11:48_5: Taṁ purisaṁ tattha tathānisinnaṁ disvā “ayañca devo”ti āsaṅkantā tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā bhisamuḷālachiddehi pavisitvā attano asurabhavanaṁ gatā.
tika-s0305t11:50_1: Aniṭṭharūpanti ettha rūpa-saddo sabhāvattho “piyarūpe sātarūpe”tiādīsu viyāti āha –
tika-s0305t11:52_0: 1115.Upāsananti ācariyaupāsanaṁ, ācariyaṁ antevāsinā vā divase divase sikkhanavasena upāsitabbato upāsananti laddhanāmaṁ kaṇḍakhipanasippaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:52_2: Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti poṅkhasaddatthaṁ pākaṭaṁ katvā dassetuṁ “ekaṁ kaṇḍaṁ khipitvā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:52_4: Anupoṅkhaṁ nāma idanti dassetuṁ “anupoṅkhaṁ nāma dutiyassa poṅkha”nti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:52_6: Puna aparaṁ tassa poṅkhanti idaṁ pana aparāparaṁ avirajjhanaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:52_10: Tassa ekaṁ bhedanti tassa kesassa ekaṁ aṁsusaṅkhātaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā.
tika-s0305t11:52_12: Aparaṁ bhedanti aparaṁ kesassa aṁsusaṅkhātaṁ bhedaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:52_13: Aggakoṭiyaṁ bandhitvāti yathā tassa vālabhedassa ūkāmattaṁ likhāmattaṁ vā kaṇḍassa aggakoṭiṁ adhikaṁ hutvā tiṭṭhati, evaṁ bandhitvā.
tika-s0305t11:52_15: Kaṇḍabaddhāya koṭiyāti kaṇḍabaddhāya vālassa koṭiyā vātiṅgaṇabandhanavālassa koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyya.
tika-s0305t11:54_4: Gīvappavesanaṁ viyāti catunnaṁ yugānaṁ chiddapadeseneva uparūpari ṭhitānaṁ chiddantarena kāṇakacchapassa gīvappavesanaṁ adhiccatarasambhavaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:54_5: Tatopi adhiccatarasambhavo manussattalābho, tato adhiccatamasambhavo ariyamaggapaṭilābhoti dassento āha “catusaccapaṭivedho ativiya adhiccatarasambhavo”ti.
tika-s0305t11:57_0: 1121.Abhisamayasaṁyuttevitthāritova, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva tassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t11:62_0: 1134.Piṭṭhasurāti piṭṭhena kātabbasurā, tathā odanasurā pūvasurā, majjarasādibhūte kiṇṇe pakkhipitvā kattabbā surā kiṇṇapakkhittasurā.
tika-s0305t11:67_1: “Mūlabīja”ntiādīsu mūlameva bījanti mūlabījaṁ, mūlabījaṁ etassātipi mūlabījaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:67_2: Tattha purimena bījagāmo vutto “bījānaṁ samūho”ti katvā, dutiyena bhūtagāmo.
tika-s0305t11:67_3: Duvidhopeso sāmaññaniddesena, “mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabīja”nti ekasesanayena vā bījattho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t11:67_6: Bāhirapaccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo.
tika-s0305t11:67_7: Tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṁ ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā vuttaṁ “bījabīja”nti “rūparūpaṁ, dukkhadukkha”nti ca yathā.
tika-s0305t11:69_1: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhiko, ayaṁ buddhādiariyānaṁ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo, tadañño vikāloti āha –
tika-s0305t11:71_0: 1150.Yaṁ kiñci pupphanti ganthimaṁ aganthimaṁ vā yaṁ kiñci pupphajātaṁ, tathā pisitādibhedaṁ yaṁ kiñci gandhajātaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:74_2: 183) bhagavato sāsanaṁ accantachandarāgapavattito naccādīnaṁ dassanaṁ na anulometīti āha “sāsanassa ananulomattā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:74_3: Attanā parehi ca payojiyamānaṁ payojāpiyamānañca eteneva nacca-saddena gahitaṁ, tathā gītavāditasaddehi cāti āha –
tika-s0305t11:74_7: Yathāsakaṁ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṁ viññāṇānaṁ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasabbhāvato “dassanā”icceva vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:74_8: Avisūkabhūtassa gītassa savanaṁ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha –
tika-s0305t11:74_11: “dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ gītaṁ vaṭṭati, gītūpasaṁhito dhammo na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0305t11:76_1: Seti etthāti sayanaṁ, uccāsayanaṁ mahāsayanañca samaṇasārupparahitaṁ paṭikkhittanti āha –
tika-s0305t11:76_4: Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyā paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā”icceva vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:76_5: Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:76_6: Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanañcāti uccāsayanamahāsayananti etasmiṁ atthe ekasesanayena ayaṁ niddeso kato yathā –
tika-s0305t11:76_8: Āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:78_1: Aññepi uggahāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha –
tika-s0305t11:78_3: Atha vā tividhaṁ paṭiggahaṇaṁ kāyena vācāya manasāti.
tika-s0305t11:78_4: Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṁ uggahaṇaṁ, vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṁ uggahāpaṇaṁ, manasā paṭiggahaṇaṁ sādiyanaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:78_5: Tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṁ sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā gahetvā “paṭiggahaṇā”ti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0305t11:82_2: acchavasaṁ, macchavasaṁ, susukāvasaṁ, sūkaravasaṁ, gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṁ uddissa anuññātaṁ nāma.
tika-s0305t11:82_3: Tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṁ vaṭṭatīti āha –
tika-s0305t11:82_5: Vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo, tasmā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayenettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-s0305t11:85_1: Kassaci bhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṁ kayo, dānaṁ vikkayo.
tika-s0305t11:85_2: Tattha tatthāti gāmantare santike ca gamanaṁ dūtakammanti vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t11:87_8: Dadanto pubbabhāgeti paresaṁ dadanto pubbabhāge hatthena tulaṁ akkamati.
tika-s0305t11:88_3: Nimiyamānassa tilataṇḍulādikassa sikhāya aggakoṭiyā bhinnaṁ sikhābhedo.
tika-s0305t11:88_5: Rajjugahaṇeneva cettha daṇḍakassa gahaṇaṁ katamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:90_1: Viheṭhanatthopi hi vadha-saddo dissati “atthānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0305t11:90_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “māraṇa”nti vuttaṁ, taṁ pana pothanaṁ sandhāyāti sakkā viññātuṁ māraṇasaddassa vihiṁsanepi dissanato.
tika-s0305t11:95_0: Sakalarūpārūpasammasane saṇhasukhumavisayañāṇatāya vipassanācāranipuṇabuddhīnaṁ susaṁyatakāyavacīsamācāratāya samathavipassanāsu sammadeva yatanato ca yatīnaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ khandhāyatanadhātusaccindriyapaṭiccasamuppādabhede paramatthadhamme nānānayehi ñāṇavibhāgassa sannissayena bahukārassa saṁyuttāgamavarassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ kātuṁ sāratthappakāsanato eva nipuṇā yā mayā aṭṭhakathā āraddhāti sambandho.
tika-s0305t11:95_1: Savisesaṁ paññāvahaguṇattā eva hissa ganthārambhe āditopi “paññāpabhedajananassā”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:96_0: Mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti pubbe vuttasaṁyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva puna nigamanavasena vuttanti.
tika-s0305t11:96_1: Atha vā mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṁ.
tika-s0305t11:96_2: Tena etaṁ dasseti “saṁyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṁ ādāya imaṁ sāratthappakāsiniṁ karontena sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viyogakkhamaṁ atthasāraṁ ādāya akāsi”nti.
tika-s0305t11:96_3: “Mahāvihārādhivāsīna”nti ca idaṁ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṁ sambandhitabbaṁ “mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṁ samayaṁ pakāsayantiṁ mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṁ mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāraṁ ādāyā”ti ca.
tika-s0305t11:96_5: Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṁ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampayuttena nibbānasukhena sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṁ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṁ pariṇāmeti.
